page.title: 05TYPICAL DAY (CONT)
page.content: Ready.I wash my hands mmm what a nice lunch.When I've finished my lunch I must go and see how my vegetables and flowers are getting on in my garden. They have grown.The Lettuces are ready to pick the potatoes are ready to dig and the mint ready for mint sauce.The flowers are lovely too not in full bloom yet but they smell so strong. What can I do next? There's nothing on television that I like,my cat has done a disappearing trick so I can't play with her.The time seems to go so slowly when you're by yourself but when you have a friend it flies away. Tea at last then I spend the rest of my evening watching television and doing some sewing.At nine thirty it's time for bed and then again it will be time to get up in the morning for another typical day. BY SARAH BOWLD.
